name: task-1771965901
description: Build real-time charts for token usage and task completion in web UI dashboard. Add dark/light mode toggle, task search/filter, and export to CSV/JSON functionality. Make it production-ready with responsive design.
verification: Enhanced web UI with Chart.js real-time charts showing task status, dark/light mode toggle with localStorage persistence, task search and filter functionality, export to JSON/CSV buttons, and fully responsive design. All features tested and working at http://localhost:8767
